name: Downfall (itch) (KnightOrc)
description:
Downfall

A game for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam with the theme "Deeper and Deeper".

Riding down a mine
with a gun and light.
There may be monsters here
but you're ready for a fight.
For when the only way is down
and you having nothing to lose.
Brace yourself stranger,
the bottom may be a long way off,
but the end is always close.

Credits:
Graphics, sound and coding: KnightOrc
Music: Nihilore
